name: City-Pile
description:
Make Piles of two cities... New Britain, USA & Venice, Italy!

Pile-on compositions by dragging things.... Right-Button drag to bring an object  to front, Left-Button drag keeps the stacking order untouched. Drag objects over the landscape icon to change the backdrop; drag them over the trash to delete, and keep on piling!  Try the "cloud" toggle, and you will alter how much fog is in your next pile. The "Save" button opens a new browser tab for your screenshot*. 

Artwork by  Eben Kling & Aude Jomini at FEED.

Development, Code & Layout by Aude Jomini at FEED.

*Due to player settings, screenshot function does not always work in fullscreen resolution in some browsers.
